comments:
When attempting to create a new EMF project an error box appears with the 
message 'the select wizard could not be started' (from file, toolbar or context 
menu).
I have version 2.0.0.R200406280827 from the update site. All features and 
plugins appear to be working from the 'manage configuration' dialog. In the 
about menu, all plugins listed in the tutorial 'generating an EMG Model' are 
present.

Here's the stack trace:

when that problem is resolved, we can reinvestigate this further if it doesn't
resolve this problem.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 70176 ***
